result.reason: Options Theme page has incomplete theming for dark themes (vs2015dark background colors wrong, Dracula missing color definitions showing pink defaults)
result.approach: Ensure ThemePage applies theme colors to its own controls (background, foreground, list items) when rendering with dark themes, and verify Dracula theme XML has complete color definitions for all required theme properties

attempts.raw_output:
The issue is about the Options -> Theme panel not being properly themed with dark themes (vs2015dark shows incorrect colors, Dracula shows pink defaults for missing color definitions).
